synopsis.text:
Magical curses, mystical witches, and a world teeming with enchantment and intrigue set the stage for the gripping tale of Guideau and Ashaf. Guideau, a fierce and untamed young woman, is cursed by an elusive witch and vows to seek vengeance. To aid her quest, she joins the Order of Magical Resonance, an esteemed organization dedicated to solving magic-related cases. In exchange for her assistance, the Order agrees to help Guideau track down the witch responsible for her curse.

Accompanied by Ashaf, a suave and enigmatic mage, the pair embarks on a journey through a fantastical world where the unexpected becomes the norm. As they delve deeper into their mission, they encounter a town seemingly under the spell of a witch who is revered as a heroine by the locals. Skeptical of the witch's benevolent facade, Guideau and Ashaf decide to unravel the truth behind her mysterious deeds.

While the pair pursues their shared goal, they are also driven by their own personal ambitions. As they uncover the complex web of intrigues and machinations behind the scenes, they must confront their past and the true nature of the curse that binds Guideau. In this thrilling dark fantasy, the line between friend and foe blurs as the duo's quest for revenge and redemption unfolds.
